hotels.title: Boutique Japan Retreat One Hour from Tokyo
hotels.description: Stay in Japan's widely applauded mountain retreat at Hotel Indigo Karuizawa, a boutique, design-driven escape perfectly perched by golf courses, hot springs and waterfalls. Make use of the 24-hour fitness centre or indulge in a treatment at the award-winning The Spa by HARNN. For a deep dive into deliciousness, KAGARIBI is an all-day authentic Italian restaurant - try the woodfired lasagne, gorgonzola and walnut gnocchi or Wagyu beef sirloin tagliata.
